name: Serendipia (unlostpixel)
description:
A narrative adventure game, set in the 1800s in the country side of a un unknown place. You play as Clara, a girl set on an adventure after her mother sends her to get water to make an apple pie.

This game was created for the Narrative Driven Game Jam #6 , all of the code, art and music was created during the jam period by the team, no external assets, everything you see is original content made for this game.

Controls
Move with the arrow keys
Spacebar to interact
E to advance dialogue 
P to pause

Game director,  coding, art - Unlost Pixel

Art - Sucurí

Music - Edgar Pineda “Kurtt L.”
